ComicInfo.Summary:
Those barely legal girls are back again in two ball-busting stories. This issue features the stories of two sisters. Big sister teaches little sister in the ways of "pet training," but rolling over and sitting up were not quite like this. The second story takes place at an isolated ice cream stand where big sister shows her trainee the real meaning of "gooey treats." All of this and more in FULL-COLOR!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:10:17. [CVDB240928]
